verses.verse: (A Song. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. For the choir director; according to) (Mahalath Leannoth. A Maskil of Heman the Ezrahite.) O Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of my salvation, <WH3444> I have cried <WH6817> out by day <WH3117> and in the night <WH3915> before <WH5048> Thee.
Let my prayer <WH8605> come <WH935> before <WH6440> Thee; Incline <WH5186> Thine ear <WH241> to my cry! <WH7440>
For my soul <WH5315> has had <WH7646> enough <WH7646> troubles, <WH9567> And my life <WH9132> has drawn <WH5060> near <WH5060> to Sheol. <WH7585>
I am reckoned <WH2803> among <WH5973> those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit; <WH953> I have <WH1961> become <WH1961> like a man <WH1397> without <WH369> strength, <WH353>

Forsaken <WH2670> among the dead, <WH4191> Like <WH3644> the slain <WH2491> who lie <WH7901> in the grave, <WH6913> Whom <WH834> Thou dost remember <WH2142> no <WH3808> more, <WH5750> And they are cut <WH1504> off <WH1504> from Thy hand. <WH3027>
Thou hast put <WH7896> me in the lowest <WH8482> pit, <WH953> In dark <WH4285> places, <WH4285> in the depths. <WH4688>
Thy wrath <WH2534> has rested <WH5564> upon me, And Thou hast afflicted <WH6031> me with all <WH3605> Thy waves. <WH4867> Selah. <WH5542>

Thou hast removed <WH7368> my acquaintances <WH3045> far <WH7368> from me; Thou hast made <WH7896> me an object <WH8441> of loathing <WH8441> to them; I am shut <WH3607> up and cannot <WH3808> go <WH3318> out.

My eye <WH5869> has wasted <WH1669> away <WH1669> because <WH4480> of affliction; <WH6040> I have called <WH7121> upon Thee every <WH3605> day, <WH3117> O Lord; <WH3068> I have spread <WH7849> out my hands <WH3709> to Thee.
Wilt Thou perform <WH6213> wonders <WH6382> for the dead <WH4191>? Will the departed <WH7496> spirits <WH7496> rise <WH6965> [and] praise <WH3034> Thee? Selah. <WH5542>
Will Thy lovingkindness <WH2617> be declared <WH5608> in the grave, <WH6913> Thy faithfulness <WH530> in Abaddon <WH11>?
Will Thy wonders <WH6382> be made <WH3045> known <WH3045> in the darkness <WH2822>? And Thy righteousness <WH6666> in the land <WH776> of forgetfulness <WH5388>?
But I, O Lord, <WH3068> have cried <WH7768> out to Thee for help, <WH7768> And in the morning <WH1242> my prayer <WH8605> comes <WH6923> before <WH6923> Thee.
O Lord, <WH3068> why <WH4100> dost Thou reject <WH2186> my soul <WH5315>? [Why] dost Thou hide <WH5641> Thy face <WH6440> from me?
I was afflicted <WH6041> and about to die <WH1478> from my youth <WH5290> on; I suffer <WH5375> Thy terrors; <WH367> I am overcome. <WH9023>
Thy burning <WH2740> anger <WH2740> has passed <WH5674> over <WH5921> me; Thy terrors <WH1161> have destroyed <WH6789> me.
They have surrounded <WH5437> me like water <WH4325> all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long; They have encompassed <WH5362> me altogether. <WH3162>
Thou hast removed <WH7368> lover <WH157> and friend <WH7453> far <WH7368> from me; My acquaintances <WH3045> are [in] darkness. <WH4285>
